Note: This guide assumes you've read the first one... You may end up completely clueless if you just jump in and try to read this one. /end of note

Since there appears to be a good deal of people who seemed to not only comprehend me, but actually get something out of the last guide, I decided to add one for common elements found in a puzzle besides immobile platforms. While I was at it, decided to throw in my trade secret for vanishing platforms (not really a trade secret, just never seen it till I made it). I also basically went over func_detail, a mappers best friend in any map, not just puzzle. Size this time was 428mb for the wordpad, and again zip made it around 28-30mb to dl.

Details of the download;
1 rtf(rich text file, aka wordpad or the likes required), size 428mb~, contains a slew of images alongside some text explaining the use of;
Func_movelinear,
Func_tracktrain,
Func_rotating,
My recipe for Vanishing Tiles,
Func_detail,
and a small amount of text about the time I discovered it took me to make the guide.
1 vmf, 151kb, the map for use in hammer after the results of the guide.
http://www.mediafire.com/?x1150yocuasy36b

Also, you may want to dl the gamemode for single player testing;
http://www.garrysmod.org/downloads/?a=view&id=52065
